component provides a default loading prompt and supports custom content through the

props.code:
<z-image show-loading width="100" height="100" />
  <!-- Custom loading prompt -->
  <z-image show-loading width="100" height="100">
     <template #loading>
       <z-loading type="spinner" size="40rpx" />
     </template>
   </z-image>

children.value: component provides a default loading failure prompt and supports custom content through the

props.code:
<z-image show-error width="100" height="100" src="x" />
<!-- Customized loading failure prompt -->
<z-image show-error width="100" height="100" src="x">
   <template #error> Loading failed </template>
</z-image>

children.value: Image cropping and scaling mode, equivalent to uniapp's
Whether to display as a circle
Whether to set the root node as a block-level element, by default an
Whether to display image loading failure prompts
Whether to display the image loading prompt
The icon name or image link prompted when failure occurs, which is equivalent to the
The icon name or image link prompted when loading, equivalent to the
The size of the loading icon and the failure icon
Icon class name prefix, equivalent to the
Scale the image without maintaining the aspect ratio, so that the width and height of the image are completely stretched to fill the image element
Scale the image while maintaining the aspect ratio so that the long side of the image is fully displayed.
Scale the image while maintaining the aspect ratio, ensuring that only the short side of the image can be fully displayed.
The width remains unchanged, the height changes automatically, and the aspect ratio of the original image remains unchanged
The height remains unchanged, the width changes automatically, and the aspect ratio of the original image remains unchanged
Do not scale the image, only show the top area of the image
Do not scale the image, only show the bottom area of the image
Does not scale the image, only displays the middle area of the image
Do not scale the image, only display the left area of the image
Do not scale the image, only show the right area of the image
Do not scale the image, only display the upper left area of the image
Do not scale the image, only display the upper right area of the image
Do not scale the image, only display the lower left area of the image
Do not scale the image, only display the lower right area of the image
Triggered when the image is clicked
Triggered when the image is loaded
Customize the content below the image
Customize the prompt content when loading fails
The component provides the following CSS variables, which can be used to customize styles. For usage, please refer to

html .default .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html .dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}html.dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}
